options.c: depends on the distance from the shore

Q6-4.name: Q6-4
Q6-4.question: What is the direction of the transport by long waves?

feedback.correct: Correct. Can you explain the direction of the transport due to long waves from the correlation between the bound long waves and the wave group? Have look at Figure 7.20 and read Section 5.8.2 in the textbook.
